page.title: 20Turnditch Personalities
page.content: {Mr.G.Wilde }believes life is easier now than it was 60 years ago. For instance, aeronautical engineers have made it possible for people of the world to travel cheaply. He enjoys renovating vintage cars.We know that both Mr. Wilde and his father before him will enter the history books as extraordinary engineers. {Mr.T.Yates} was born in Windley.His father won many prizes for Shire horses but he believes he has now won more than he did.He is a very modest man but has in fact met most of the Royal Family at some time or other. {Mrs.M.Wagstaff }has lived in this village for over 40 years and seems as active now as she was then.When she is not playing the organ in Turnditch Church or elsewhere she may be doing some work at the School, housework, crochet,knitting,cooking or gardening.
